messages.title: I'VE KEPT MY ELECTION PROMISES AS YOUR MP
messages.content: Geraint Davies details the promises he has kept such as removing tolls on bridges, voting against a hard Brexit and austerity, and opposing fracking.

messages.title: MY PROMISE TO YOU
messages.content: He is committed to fighting for a fairer share of UK investment, a reformed business rate to help high street shops, and a better Swansea.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Geraint Davies pledges to abolish Severn Bridge Tolls, combat austerity and hard Brexit, and oppose fracking.
Pledges include securing fair funding, opposing hard Brexit, fighting for environmental protection, public health, and workers' rights.

issues.brexitEurope: Voting against a hard Brexit, promising to oppose hard Brexit in Parliament.
issues.economy: Fairer share of UK investment, reformed business rate for high street shops, plans to save post offices and ban ATM charges.
issues.environment: Environmental Protection promises with back Swansea Bay tidal lagoon and Marbles Renewal Energy.
issues.health: Public health pledges, securing funding for local NHS and protecting it from privatization.

housing.content: Promises to build the City Deal 'digital village' and marbles Renewal Energy.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Swansea West

images.caption: Front page picture of Geraint Davies

leaflet.additionalNotes: Labour's manifesto promises such as no rise in income tax for those earning under Â£80,000, free school meals for all primary school children, and others are mentioned. Praises from constituents are also featured.
